website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-wear slip-on shoe with a comfortable cushioned midsole.
pros: The Jungle Moc features a comfortable design with a good deal of arch support
There are no laces to deal with so the upper moulds snugly to the foot
Slip-on construction makes it easy to quickly get these on and head out the door for a quick errand
cons: may be too tight for some

customer_reviews.title: Same Merrell quality!! Glad somethings don't change!
customer_reviews.text: My new jungle Mocs replaced a pair I've had for more than a dozen years. The old pair was still in good shape, aside from the sole tread which had, understandably, worn down so was a bit slippery in ice and snow. I was thrilled to be able to order an identical replacement! They fit well, a bit more snugly than old one, as they'd been slipped off an on for years. Great quality product, good warmth, arch support and keep feet dry. Perfect for days with rain or snow on hat doesn't pass the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: GloryGirl

customer_reviews.title: They look great with almost anything
customer_reviews.text: You simply can't go wrong with these shoes. They are long-lasting, well-made shoes that look professional and offer long-lasting comfort + high arch support on the job. They also work functionally well as light hiking shoes for easy-moderate trail hiking or just going on a walk around town. They look great with almost anything, with their simple clean lines and yet are sturdy enough to offer the utility you need for everything from yard work to walking the track at a local gym. Give them a go. Best investment your feet will ever love you for.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Szumiesz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great for cobblestones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I have worn Merrell Siren shoes for many years and ordered the jungle mocs (same size) on a whim. I took them on a trip thinking they would be ideal for the airplane ride because I could slip them off easily. I ended up wearing them the whole trip where I walked miles a day over rough cobblestones; I never took my Merrell Sirens out of the suitcase. Who would have thought?
customer_reviews.author: Alice C

customer_reviews.title: I think I can call them defective.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes for years. Same style, same color, same size. In fact, this time I bought two pairs to have them for a while. To my surprise and disappointment, my foot wouldn't even fit in the shoe. I triple checked to make sure they were the same size and they were, but they just wouldn't fit. I wonder if they put the wrong label on them, saying it's a size 8 M and it's probably a 7. Although the problem was really that they were too tight, couldn't fit my foot in to tell how the length fit. Very disappointed since I always loved these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely tight- must be irregular!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this same pair of shoes for at least 15 years- I just buy a new one every so often to have a fresh pair. So I am quite familiar with how they are supposed fo fit, and Merrell is a solidly consistent brand. This particular pair that they are selling here must be Irregularly sized because it is crazy tight!! So much so that it gave me an abrasion on my instep and swelling there from the tightness and the rubbing. I sent them back for a full refund and repurchased the shoes at a local store- and now I have a normal pair again. Beware buying them here!!
customer_reviews.author: Inspired By Life

customer_reviews.title: The sizing has changed. I needed half size up
customer_reviews.text: The Jungle Moc is my winter go to shoe, and my older ones are looking a bit shabby. I ordered these in the same size as before, but it is not the same. The 8 M was much narrower all thru the shoe, not just the toe area. The old ones came from China these from Vietnam. Not sure why the sizing would be so different. Other than that, the shoes look fine. Have to return them. Update Jan 4 2020: I reordered this in 8.5 M and it fits just fine, and will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Doc W8

customer_reviews.title: Can't find better!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Merrell shoes since I worked for the Railroad. They provide support for your feet. Winter and summer. There is NO better support. My friends all have foot problems and fallen arches. You will never wear a more comfortable shoe. The arch support is available in all styles.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Run small.  Less room in toe box and hard to get on.  Great support.
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size ranges from 7-1/2 to 8-1/2 usually. I usually get 8-1/2 in shoes like these. I like them loose and I like to wear thick socks. These shoes are not loose at all. I could barely get my foot in, and my toes just fit. However, the arch support seems great and I think these will be good for my plantar fasciitis. I would order them in a larger size but I think they would slip around my ankle. I am keeping them hoping they will stretch out as other reviewers have said.
customer_reviews.author: Jiveturkey1

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable and order at least 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9 because some said the shoe ran a little big. I wear between a 9 and a 10. But only a 10 usually in a running shoe or something that runs really small. A 9.5 prob wld have been perfect in this shoe as far as size. However as far as comfort, I bought this shoe based on the reviews for comfort. I have a bad back. There is no way I could wear this shoe to work. Maybe in a larger size and an insert but why should I have to buy an insert for a new shoe? So I am returning the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Once comfortable shoe is no longer comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in this shoe. I’ve been ordering and wearing this brand and color of shoe for the last several years and this recent order has been the only time the shoes are not fitting well. They appear used on the exterior and the fit is not comfortable at all. I doubt I will be buying these once really reliable and comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeach

customer_reviews.title: like they always do
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been wearing Merrell's for over 30 years. The pair she ordered from Amazon did not fit well so I had to send them back. We went out to a local store and bought a new pair and they fit perfectly... like they always do. It's possible that Merrell sends out a cheaper version to Amazon... or that they are slightly different. who knows. Amazon had me send them back at no charge, as they always do. They're such a great company to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Woldin

customer_reviews.title: Sizing & fit are problematic
customer_reviews.text: I expected these shoes to be problem free because they’re Merrill’s. I find that the outside sides of the shoes rub under my ankle as if the shoe is too deep- & they’re too short. I ALWAYS wear a size 8 shoe, but these needed to an 8 1/2. I kept trying to “break in” & stretch out- & now it’s beyond time limit for return. VERY expensive mistake & so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: camille r.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged shoes - had to return as very stiff and too small for my big foot
customer_reviews.text: I vary between a women's 11 and 12, but generally wear an 11 in Merrell and other similar shoes. These shoes looked great out of the box, but they are stiff and were hard to get on. Once on, they were just too tight. They might have worked looser over time, but the box with any instructions was also missing. They were sent in a nice cardboard shoe box but no tags. I decided to return as I wanted something that was easier to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dickerman

customer_reviews.title: I  DO NOT TRUST THIS VENDOR! But I love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure I rec'd return or 2nds! Shoe arrived with albeit small, but permanent scuff mark on toe. The suede will not come smooth no matter how carefully, lightly i smooth it. Worst there are ripped!!! again small, but this time significant stitching tears on the shoe. I will trim them hoping they tear does not go further. I needed these shoes right away, and bcz they fit perfectly I decided to keep them. .Don't mind the scuff marks as much as the 2 small tears in the stitched edging. I took pictures Before I every wore them. if I find time I will post photos. YES. Buy this great shoe--but from a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: tellitru

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, .... anywhere but working in a restaurant
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality of this shoe and Merrell shoes is terrific. I have owned many pairs of Merrells, I love the slip-resistant work safe feature and having plantar fasciitis these were the only brand my feet could tolerate. Unfortunately this particular style IS NOT SLIP-RESISTANT for a restaurant setting. Any bit of water on the floor and I felt like I was on ice, I almost fell several times. Overall if you are looking to buy these for anything other than a restaurant type setting give them a try, the brand is great.
customer_reviews.author: gmBelle80

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same shoe at REI years ago and they're finally starting to wear out so I bought another pair. They are one of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. My feet are a bit wide but they always fit perfectly, never binding or rubbing any where on my foot. The size runs very true. I've had the other pair for years and they've held up well. They only reason I'm replacing is the sole is finally wearing down after so much use. Otherwise they are in great shape! Very comfortable and good quality shoe. I always have good luck with Merrell and these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than my old ones
customer_reviews.text: I was given a pair of the exact same Merrell's about 10 years ago, and they were so comfortable! I wore them alot. They finally wore out so I bought this pair. The problem is, they're slightly narrower than the old ones. They might "compress" enough to wear with light socks, but not with winter-weight sox. And they are cool-weather shoes, not something worn in the summer. I am returning them, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird54

customer_reviews.title: but WOW these things have been WONDERFUL. Got a size 7 same as I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried Merrells a few years ago and for some reason it was just awful for my feet at the time. Not sure what happened, if they did a little change on em, or if my feet changed - maybe I got the wrong size ... but WOW these things have been WONDERFUL. Got a size 7 same as I wear in most any other shoe and fit perfect. Comfy for a good while to walk in (I personally can't be on my feet super long hours, but can handle a lot more now with these), great stability, just great shoes. They look great to boot :D
customer_reviews.author: Christin L Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around daily shoe you can find
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these back in August 2014, and I'm wearing them right now. They served me as almost daily shoes for about two years, and then got downgraded to farm work shoes, and have served in that capacity for another year (and are still going strong). These are comfortable, sturdy, well-made shoes. My daughter recently got a job as a dishwasher, and after a couple of months, was on the hunt for a shoe that offered good support for those 14 hour shifts on her feet, and which were also water proof. We found the solution with another style of Merrill shoe, and she couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Lily G

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are made for walking.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes out and then order another pair. These are my "go to" shoes for cold weather. They are well made, sturdy, lined, have a thick and slip-proof sole and they are waterproof. I have to walk quite a bit on my daily commute to and from work and these shoes keep my feet warm and dry. The pull tab on the back makes getting these on and off very easy. I got these in a half size bigger so I can wear thick socks during the thick of winter. You can't go wrong with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Running Too Small~
customer_reviews.text: I should have gone by prior reviews of this show design, I ordered a size larger than I wear because folks said it runs small. The larger size was too small, it doesn't have the elastic in the area where you insert your foot, there is no give. I returned them, tried another pair and the same thing. Had to return those as well. I'm done buying Merrell online~
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a Seconds Product
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe was too loose, but the left show fit fine. This is the first negative experience I have had with these Merrell shoes, but it is also the first time I purchased Merrill shoes from Amazon. I usually purchase from Zappos. Lesson learned. When I inspected the shoe, the elastic sewn on both sides of the top of the slip on was actually wider than the left shoe. R. Witten
customer_reviews.author: UK Wildcat Fan

customer_reviews.title: Had these before for years and love them
customer_reviews.text: Merrell makes great shoes. Had a pair of same style for years, very happy to find it again as the other pair finally started coming apart. I really abused the other pair - hiking, on the beach for kayaking trips, gunching around town. Easy to slip on and off, comfortable, these are my go-to shoes. My husband has the men’s version and he loves them too
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not as comfy right out of the box as previously
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure they’ll eventually break in and be as comfortable as the last pair, but these are not the Merrell jungle mocs I fell in love with so many years ago. They’re stiff, especially on the sides, and hurt my feet, unlike previous pairs right out of the box. However, they’re still one of the few shoes like this that accommodate a high instep & arch. I’m definitely looking forward to their loosening up.
customer_reviews.author: annekohl

customer_reviews.title: too tight for me
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Merrell brand. I bought these to replace a very old pair that I wore to the end. I really wanted theses to work, but the size was just too tight. I wear a 6, and would try a 6 W before going half size up. Maybe I just got a tight fitting one? I will search for something similar. Definitely Merrell, just a different style.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B.

customer_reviews.title: Same size that I have ordered before and way too small
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several pairs of this Merrell shoe on Amazon and this time the fit was way too small. I am wondering if this pair is legit. Also, this is the 14th day since Amazon received the return and I still do not have my refund. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mac

customer_reviews.title: The Best Farm Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my farm shoes. They hold up to anything and while they don’t say they are waterproof, in my experience they are. I had been buying muck shoes for years but their quality has gone down so I looked for a new shoe and I’m so happy to find these. I’ve given them quite a work out for three months and they are a little dirty but no tears, hard working soles and like I said above, they’ve kept my feet dry through mud, rain, water spills and morning dew.
customer_reviews.author: TinyForest

customer_reviews.title: Order your normal size
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a size up (10.5) in brown earlier and they really are too big even with custom inserts over the Merrell inserts. However, that pair are my "muck" shoes and they show it well. I wear those with heavy wool socks and yet there is still "sloppy" movement so walking over rough terrain is not possible. But they are comfortable! So, decided to purchase another pair in normal size 10 and they fit perfect--even with custom inserts over the Merrell inserts. They are very comfortable, warm and shed water well. I can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: C. M-R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe👍
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital on my feet for 12hour shifts. These shoes are the perfect shoe. The first time I wore them was for a 12h shift. No blisters no sore feet well supported arch. I highly recommend them to everyone I know and have replaced Merrells with Merrells ever since. I did go to a Merrells store for proper sizing for Merrells products. Prices are great as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised in look and  feel for a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Nurse on feet for 14 hrs, tried many shoes over the years, my last one Altra Olympic 2.0 was changed to specs that no longer worked for me. So far these were inexpensive, delivered quickly, looked EXACTLY as advertised and fit to size. They are stiff as new, so require using my finger to guide foot in properly until they loosen some with wear. I feel good about the hiking sole and cushion so far ( same feel as Merril hiking boots ) and will add on to this once time has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Doe Outdooronly

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: These run really small. REALLY small. I had ro buy a full size larger and they're still snug, but I like them and will wear them and hope for a little stretch.
customer_reviews.author: gillian pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were easier to slip on that I thought they'd be but expect I will use a long shoe horn when wearing socks. I did wear them around the house for a day without socks and they were very comfortable. The "tread" on the sole is very heavy-duty and I think they will work very well for outdoor hiking and dog walking, especially in less than perfect weather. I love the color and may buy another pair in a different color, as I often do when I really like something. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these Merrell shoes. I am writing this for my second pair, as my old ones don't look as spiffy as I would like. So now my old pair can get worn in the rain while the new pair get worn under better circumstances. I love the way they feel; when I wear them I feel like I walk with more confidence. I know that sounds corny but it's true.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleDiane

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this shoe because it felt great to my foot but after 5 minutes of wearing it on my slab floors, i had to send them back bc of incredible back pain. The arch is very supportive, but not in the right way for me...im an overpronator
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: The tread was not as "aggressive" as I wanted, and they were too small. I wear an 8-81/2 , sometimes a 9, but often that is too big in the toe. These were too small at size 9. I think I would have liked them if they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Julieannimal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for the active, outdoor person/family
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Merrill’s and wear them frequently. I have a pair of Merrill’s that are 25 years old, they look like new albeit stretched out from heavy use. Every family member in the household has two pair of Merrill’s that we wear almost daily. Best shoe! Very comfortable and feet stay warm and dry. The outer material cleans up easily and the shoes do not look any different after the mud is cleaned off. Perfect shoe for the outdoorsey family!
customer_reviews.author: BiG Co.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, fit, sturdiness, Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair for years, would wear them to to the barn to do my chores. I used them until the sole was falling from the shoe, and went a few months using my other barn boots.. I had to get another pair, the ease of the slip on and comfort just makes all of the difference. That thick sole really stands up and gives me good cushion, love these. The size was perfect for me, and they run wider which for my bunion feet I am grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McCreery

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these shoes I have ordered for my granddaughter. She says they are the only shoes, she can wear all day at work and still have comfortable feet when she comes home. The soles are very supportive yet still comforting to the foot. The inside of the shoes are soft and have no seams that irritate her feet. According to her, they are worth the money she has to pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the recommendation from a friend who also has foot issues. The shoes are not very stylish but I’m for comfort not style. I wore these indoors for a couple of hours and found them to be too stiff and hard. I wear another brand that has support and even with the support they are not ‘hard’. I decided to return the shoes. I wear a size 8 shoe and these are a size 8 and had a good fit with socks. I’m glad Prime offers free returns. I was hoping these would be my new slip on outdoor shoe but they weren’t comfortable enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Not good without socks but I love them anyway!
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for slip on shoes with some structure that I could wear without socks. These do not work for me without socks, the tag in the top made a blister on top of my foot! But they are the most comfortable shoes I've had...maybe ever! I'm heavy set and tend to break down my shoes pretty quickly. I've been wearing these every day for a couple of months and they are still good as new. They have a firm sole but cushiony inside, and I feel like I could walk in them forever. As long as they don't change the design, Merrell has earned a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Lenna

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but toe box is tapered and tight on my toes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes they are comfortable for a while but then feel tight in the toe box. Maybe they will Break in after wearing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were great but I ended up giving them away because the arch just does not fit my foot and make my feet so sore. The person I gave them to tho likes them for casual wear. They end up hurting her feet too if she walks to far in them
customer_reviews.author: LadyLover

customer_reviews.title: perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are all I wear anymore... besides my Birkenstocks, which can't be worn in the snowy north where we live. They are perfect for my feet... the shape, the arch, the instep... I feel so fortunate to have found them. Now, all I have to have is the size and I can order them... just like my Birks. That's how I like to shop anyways... I hate fussing around shopping.
customer_reviews.author: K Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Favorite winter shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Jungle Mocs for years. I have high arches and feel supported. They're easy to slip on and off. They're warm, and I just shoveled snow and ice off my deck and stairs without slipping or sliding. But if I were going hiking, I'd carry my ice grips with me to be on the safe side. But for walking around town or on the trail by the river, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Cerified amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes ever. They hug my feet so comfortably, and they have great arch support. They feel so nice to wear. I am glad to have a shoe that I can wear casually, or dress up if need be. I only wish that the strap on the back of the shoe was black - but I don't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Emory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supportive shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent arch support! I work in Health care and stand for many hours. I was wearing old running shoes without enough support and developed midfoot arthritis. Within 2 weeks of wearing these with its excellent stiff soles and arch support the morning stiffness is almost completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: surfagrl

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and constricting
customer_reviews.text: You can tell this is a high quality made shoe, it just wasn't my cup of tea. It is a heavy shoe and while there is a lot of support, it's not very cushy, which I need walking on a hard floor as a server. It was also a little hot and constricting on my foot. I prefer a light roomy shoe that feels like your not wearing a shoe. I could see feeling relieved at the end of the day to take this off. Maybe because I'm not used to the clog type of shoe....it was just very clunky and rubbed on the back of my heel because of the spandex strips when I walked.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, but very squeaky
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous shoes, as expected. I've had at least one pair of jungle mocs in rotation for at least the last 10 years, and I'm very pleased with these, except for how much they squeak!!! I narrowed the sound down to something going on with the insoles and used some anti-chafing gel on the bottoms of the insole, which luckily got rid of the squeaking. I don't think that should be necessary with new shoes...but otherwise I'm very happy with them (as I've always been with my other jungle mocs).
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Jungle Mocs. Simply The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Merrells for well over ten years, now. They are durable, rugged, with firm grip soles, easy to put on and take off, and just the best show anyone could ask for. Back in 1988 I had developed bone spurs and plantar fascitis. I got orthotic inserts made for me and my feet were fine.... until, in 2004 they broke! Unable to afford replacements, I went without. The Merrell shoes give my feet SUCH good support, that from 2004 until today in 2016, I simply don't need the orthotics. These shoes are the BEST shoes I've EVER worn.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvi S.

customer_reviews.title: Best rugged shoes for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these shoes for years and have worn them almost daily during the winter months for several years. They fit well, offer great support, and are very comfortable. The soles last extremely well without wearing off on pavement. When they get muddy, I let them dry and then brush them well. When they got extremely muddy, I sprayed them with a garden hose and then put them into my washer with muddy socks and blue jeans. As a result, I have just purchased two more pairs In different colors. This product is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelba

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: To me it feels like a knock off not the quality I was expecting from this company
customer_reviews.author: Monkiekitty

customer_reviews.title: Merrell,  Quality First!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only shoes I wear, discovered first in my years of professional working on the run, so to speak. Stylish, functional and they last for years, even with daily wearing. Now I use my older pair for everyday chores and this new pair for almost every function when stepping out. If you are young or senior like me, with many knee replacements, these shoes hold your footing firm on all surfaces. As long as Merrell keeps making this model, I will purchase and do highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary W. Black

customer_reviews.title: Hard fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 different pairs. The first the support hit my heal, the second the heal had a weird bubble under it and the third were just to narrow for my narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Glad I finally caved
customer_reviews.text: All my shoes are made by Merrell, and yet I resisted getting a pair of these for years. Glad I finally caved, because these are awesome. Easy to slip on and off without bending over--no laces to tie!--and very durable. My only complain is really not the fault of the shoe, exactly--the arch support isn't great, but I have custom orthotics, so there really isn't ANY shoe that supports my arches as my orthotics would. Nevertheless, these shoes are comfortable and suit the purpose I bought them for, which was to have shoes I can slip on and off quickly when I need to duck outside for animal chores and then get back inside quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made casual slip-on shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a surprise for my wife. She has very small feet since she stands 5’ tall. She is very pleased and wears them often as she steps outside to take the dogs out or to grab mail. Her regular size varies between 4-1/2 to 5, so these in a size 5 worked perfectly. I have my own, and I too think highly of the brand and this particular shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Tomb

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Buy from manufacturer... I know I will next time
customer_reviews.text: Theses were a gift from my daughter sold by Angel Seller and I finally wore them last week. WORST SHOE EVER. I have had numerous pairs of the mesh ones in past but these hurt my feet soooo badly. I wish I had bought them from the manufacturer (Merrell) or Zappos because then I would be able to get some product support.
customer_reviews.author: Lena465

customer_reviews.title: Proper foot support
customer_reviews.text: I suffered for several years with, hip, knee, ankle problems. My knees would not track properly. Grind. I literally cannot wear any other shoe. I recommend suede because it 'breaks in' customing the fit. This is the best shoe around. (Actually, both of them.)
customer_reviews.author: Rose Magda

customer_reviews.title: Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.text: My feet ache, Fibromyalgia, among other issues bother my feet, ankles and legs. I needed a full shoe, casual that was supportive, yet not flashy colors or looking like an athletic shoe.... these work great! I did order up a 1/2 size in case I needed to wear my ankle brace... fits great.
customer_reviews.author: shari l hanson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I've heard a lot of folks rave about these shoe's. I gave it a four star rating only because they just don't feel right for me. Not sure if I bought the wrong size or what. But after walking a bit with these my feet start to hurt. Otherwise they appear very well made.
customer_reviews.author: TempestScout

customer_reviews.title: Good but not breathable at all
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were a mix of fit perfect and too small so I ordered a half size bigger and they are too big. I still wear them. They are super comfortable for long shifts. However they do a weight to them and are not breathable. I bought them for long retail shifts but had to switch back to my regular sneakers because my feet were sweating so much I was getting blisters.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for longs days on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Im a bigger woman with large feet and I am on my feet for 12-14 hours a day. These are the first shoes that I look forward to putting on every day. They have SUPER arch support its really high which is great for my flat feet but if you dont like that much support these wont be for you. I have no issue being on my feet for the first time in years. I will absolutely buy these again when they wear out. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Raber

customer_reviews.title: Beyond comfort
customer_reviews.text: The Merrill Mocs are truly the only shoe that has given me the comfort, fit and overall support I need being on my feet a good deal of the day. They are climate controlled so my feet never get too hot or too cold. I love how I can just slip my feet into them and how my feet immediately feel secure and "laced up" like they're in a good athletic shoe. I especially like how they look and how they blend nicely with most of my wardrobe. They wear so well and are very affordable. It is the only shoe I can see myself wearing year after year. Please never stop making this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Not the size i ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9. It was tight wgen i first put them on so ive been wearing them hoping to break them in. They continue to be tight. I happened to look at the sole and it says 6-8. Ive stopped wearing them. Waste of money. This is why i hate ordering shoes online.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are good
customer_reviews.text: I needed and purchased these shoes due to my plantar facitis and high arch and for waitressing and working retail which need to be slip proof. these are by no means slip proof. They are supportive and comfortable, I think I needed a size smaller but they still fit fine. I was hoping for a better cushion support since I am on my feet for 8 hours at a shift. Would I recommend them yes, is there something out there that is better, probably. I am good with these for now but will keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: These looked like nice quality shoes but I had to return them. I usually wear an 8 W so I bought a 8.5 regular which is all they sell. They were too narrow anyway. I bought them for my plantar fasciitis because of the arch support, but can't say if they would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Patcake

customer_reviews.title: One shoe is bigger and loose
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many pairs of these Mocs over the years. I still use my first pair for gardening. But this pair is lighter, doesn't seem as well cushioned, and the left shoe is bigger and very loose. I only took these out of the box last week, for fall wearing, and unfortunately it is too late to return them to Amazon. But I would definitely return them if I could. I will be looking elsewhere for quality slip-ons for indoor wear. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wisecrone

customer_reviews.title: Too wide and footbed too hard
customer_reviews.text: I returned a 9. Usually wear a 9 in BORN or Clark. These shoes were fine in length but wide across arch. The footbed was hard. Very uncomfortable. Will not buy Merrill again as they have not fit in past either
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Sad to see a good product ruined by it's own ...
customer_reviews.text: I am stunned by the cheapness of this product. I would say they are seconds. The suede isn't even brushed. They are very narrow, certainly not a medium width. I held Merrell to a higher standard then this. Sad to see a good product ruined by it's own company. This would have been my 5th pair through the years.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly, great foot support, and so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love Merrell shoes. I've had a pair of brown jungle mocs for a few years. I recently was hired for a job where we are required to wear black shoes with black soles. We also stand and walk for hours. I had other good quality brands but by the end of the night my feet would be hurting. I took advantage of Prime day to get black ju gle mocs. What a difference. Merrells are the best. They also fit perfectly at my size. I can't recommend them enough! Do yourselves a favor. Really.
customer_reviews.author: N Moss

customer_reviews.title: BEST shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the support, ease of slipping into them, the bounce. Ugh everything! I’m a nurse and wearing these have made my walking all day so much easier. I’m tempted to buy another so I always have one! No joke. They are worth the money, true to size! I’m a women’s 12.5 so I bought a 10 and they fit like a dream. BUY THEM! Or buy me another pair 😜
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Taber

customer_reviews.title: Walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad big toe and the toe width was perfect! I bought these to take with me on my trip to the UK. The only problem I see with them is the top that hits right at the bend of the foot. I think it’s too high up. But I hope I get used to it. Make sure you spray them with a weather repellent spray!! Btw I got the black ones.
customer_reviews.author: SFields

customer_reviews.title: Nice slip-on shoe with good support
customer_reviews.text: Nice slip-on shoe with good support. I usually wear my lace up Merrell's while walking my dog but these are very comfortable and easy on/off for walking. Heel area doesn't slip/slide like some slip-on style shoes. Enjoy the light weight feel of this shoe. After owning and wearing then for many months they've stretched out enough that in order for them to fit well I must wear geavy socks. Because of this I wouldn't purchase again. My husband has purchased the same shoe for men and loves them. He did not have this problem. Good quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I've owned. I had my last pair which I wore all through the fall and winter for 5 years and they're worn out. They needed replaced. Very comfy and sturdy to make it through the Midwest ice and snow. Just slip on and out the door...love them
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: Not Leather
customer_reviews.text: This product says leather that's why I ordered them but they are suede. They are nice shoes but I don't like the suede look, disappointed. I will keep them for kicking around but I won't wear them for everyday use like intended.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Merrell's that are more than 20 years old that I now wear for garden chores. They simply never wear out. Design, materials and sizing remain the same. My only complaint is that Merrell doesn't make this shoe in navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ties narrower than before
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. They fight tight at the tie area. Last ones were wider n more comfortable. I took out inserts n fit good but lost arch support. Haven’t tried the store ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: After several surgeries, I reallyI struggle finding a good shoe. These Merrell Mocs are wonderful! They are comfortable, provide good support, and I can walk in them for hours without hurting. Only wish they came in more colors! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anagami

customer_reviews.title: The price is so good compared to what you see in the stores (if ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my wife's third pair. She raves about the first ones and actually is still wearing them. They were beginning to show their age so she bought a second pair for work and keeps the first pair for around home, running errands, etc.. The price is so good compared to what you see in the stores (if you can find them) she decided to get yet another pair to hang onto for future use just in case they become hard to get. She is very particular about comfortable and well-fitting shoes and she swears these are the most comfortable shoes she has ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Bolles

customer_reviews.title: Length is the only problem
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look and feel good. Very cushy. I wear them with orthotics just fine. The problem is the length, not the width. The size finder suggested I wear a 7.5, which is my usual size, but it was way too long. My heel wasn't held in by the shoe. So I returned them for a 7, which fits width-wise just as well, but the length is still just a bit too long and so my heel still slips a bit. I don't have narrow feet that I know of. Still, I like how they feel and the color is as shown, so I'm not going to return these pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sample Reader

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say anything bad about these shoes. They are comfortable and lightweight. I really like that they are slip on style. I take my shoes off immediately upon coming in the house and this makes it less cumbersome. This is my second pair like these and like the first pair, they are a great fit. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Solid comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair just like this from Cabelas for years and years. Wore them out. Cabelas doesn't have their own anymore so I tried Merrells. Good fit, solid shoe. Its a heavier shoe but thats what I wanted for muddy falls and slipper winters. I ordered size 9 shoe and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. The day after I got them I wore them hiking for most of the day, and they felt great. I brought another pair of shoes to change into in case the jungle mocs needed to be broken in slowly, but I didn’t need them. I’ve wanted a pair of these for a long time, and I’m very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: amandalee66

customer_reviews.title: and the elastic gussets got pretty stretched out
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd pair--i wore the 1st pair for a few years, and the elastic gussets got pretty stretched out, and the tread was almost gone from t he bottoms, so they weren't so good in snow. the toe box is generous, maybe to allow for warm socks--love these!
customer_reviews.author: streakyj

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great! They are comfy and fit perfect. I received them today, they were a present for a family member, I had to give it to her tonight but unfortunately the left shoe had a white/grey spot & also a scratch on the side. Not happy with that specially because they were a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Oriana Robles

customer_reviews.title: Check items before mailing.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the shoe box I noticed the shoes was not wrapped in the paper that was in the box and there is a scuff mark on the left shoe toe area. Other than that there great. Just please be careful and check inside the shoe boxes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Hobie

customer_reviews.title: I have flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet, I could've used less arch support, but i'm getting used to it. It's the first pair I've ever bought with that much arch support, usually it's not a big deal but they're extremely comfortable overall and nice sturdy shoes which I like for most weather in New England.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have had a pair for 10 years now and they are still in good condition except a little dirty from wear. I refuse to throw away my old ones as they serve the purpose. Did i need a new pair? Yes, in deed as i can wear my new ones for special occasions. Oh, why lie, I will wear the new ones just as much as i wear my old ones. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Jean Young

customer_reviews.title: Fits the best
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding shoes I can wear for more than a couple of hours. These are comfortable all day. Not stylish, just good fit, okay support, fairly waterproof. I'm on my fourth pair. Just wish they made them in cognac brown.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Gal in NH

customer_reviews.title: Quality suede, perfect fit and warm.
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent -- warm, fits perfect and quality suede. I plan to wear it in a light snow and slush. Good in temperatures as low as -8 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Maraian

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these for years and they finally wore out. I could not find locally at Academy (they only carry men's in the stores) so I ordered online. They are very comfortable and warm in the winter. They resist water too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supportive Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a versatile shoe that I wear around town as well as for yard work. The surface brushes clean easily, and the support is unmatched. I own another pair in a different color and will probably order a third. Enough room for socks, but warm enough in cool weather to use with bare feet. I have not worn them in the rain so I do not know how they old up in wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Illback

customer_reviews.title: Good news for Plantar Fasciitis sufferers. These shoes rock!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A shoe that is actually comfortable to wear while suffering with plantar fasciitis. I wear these at work and (until I get another pair) for my daily life. Easy to slip on and off. Not the best looking shoes but that is secondary to actually being able to walk comfortably. I'm hoping their sneakers provide this much support as well. The only negative is that they are not good for slippery surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: MarLo

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe with a few issues to watch out for.
customer_reviews.text: I do like these shoes, as they are comfortable and easy to slip on. I like the rugged look to them, and on normal terrain, they are great. That being said, as others have mentioned, they are very slippery on any slick surface. Was walking across tiles and didn't see a small spot of water and my feet almost went out from under me. Also, if you happen to step onto a slightly uneven surface, the shoe just flips to the side and you can easily twist your ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Offworlder

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: a great shoe, actually I am fortunate to own 2 pair, in different sizes. This is my winter pair which I can wear with thick socks. They are great for striding along outdoors over sometimes uneven ground. I wore my previous pair of Merrells for at least ten years and they finally have worn out. Very worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Reed

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the comfort and good looks of this shoe. It’s everyday casual and good support for most any activity, especially out and about errands and a good walker. Solidly made and durable sole. Merrell shoes are my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The B width is exactly a B width
customer_reviews.text: If your need a wider shoe don't buy the B width, this is a true B width, fits my foot perfectly just like all the other Merrell shoes I have purchased in the past. Its a great shoe, never disappoints !
customer_reviews.author: S. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was really looking forward to these shoes, but the 8 which is the correct size falls off, they do seem to be made well with good support for your feet. The color i chose seemed just a bit darker. I did not re-order a 7.5 so not sure how that would have fit.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: jungle moc shoes
customer_reviews.text: I buy two at a time. Have bought many times. I have bone problems in one foot and only shoe that don't make my foot hurt.
customer_reviews.author: bonita

customer_reviews.title: Huge but great quality
customer_reviews.text: As usual I love Merrells but unfortunately these shoes are humongous on me! They are still so sturdy and so comfortable (& I’m so lazy) that I may not return them for a smaller size. The arch support in Merrell shoes is like none other and never wears out (the shoe soles do first).
customer_reviews.author: jeff and karen newton

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 1/2 smaller than I usually wear. They fit perfectly. I also have a lot of problems with my high arches and they are super comfortable. I really was shocked how comfortable they were. I have had them for a month now and they are holding up great. Haven't been hiking in them, but for an every day shoe, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: sarah lippincott

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Jungle Moc Slip On
product_meta.description: Simple, comfy and casual--this slip-on from Merrell is a perfect fit.
feature_bullets: Aegis treated lining and synthetic upper
Simple, comfy and casual--this slip-on from Merrell is a perfect fit.
